Rewards Rate: 1.5 RPs per Rs. 100 spent and 1.2 RPs per Rs. 100 spent on utilities & insurance categories.
Reward Redemption: 1 RP = ₹0.40 While Redeeming Points Against Cash. For Non-Cash Redemption 1 RP = ₹0.60
Insurance Benefits: Complimentary Air Accidental death cover worth Rs. 25 Lakhs.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transcations between Rs. 400 and Rs. 4,000 at all fuel stations in India.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: Rs. 300 or 2.5% of the amount withdrawn, higher of the two.

product_details: 1.5 reward points on every ₹ 150 spent on this card (except on fuel).
Get a complimentary air accidental death cover of up to ₹ 25 lakh.
